name: Blue Nightmare
description: Blue Nightmare, bred by RNM Flowers, is a resinous, berry-flavored hybrid cross between Blue Dream and Tahoe OG. From the Tahoe OG indica, Blue Nightmare inherits a thick bud structure and a heavy blanket of crystal trichomes that promises intense euphoria and creativity. Blue Nightmare maintains the famous blueberry aroma of its Blue Dream parent, along with many of its widely cherished happy and relaxing effects.
descriptionPlain: Blue Nightmare, bred by RNM Flowers, is a resinous, berry-flavored hybrid cross between Blue Dream and Tahoe OG. From the Tahoe OG indica, Blue Nightmare inherits a thick bud structure and a heavy blanket of crystal trichomes that promises intense euphoria and creativity. Blue Nightmare maintains the famous blueberry aroma of its Blue Dream parent, along with many of its widely cherished happy and relaxing effects.

highlightedReviews.text: I loved this strain! (I actually suggested it to leafly!) It gave the most stereotypical high I've had. Very giggly, very relaxed, very happy, and lasted forever. The only reason it's not one of my favorites is because, focusing is virtually impossible, and if you want a high for a shorter amount of time, even if you smoke a small amount, its not happening...at all lol.

Have you noticed that virtually every reviewer believes this strain is special?  It's because it is. This is one of those unique strains that has an amazing smell from a unique sweet blueberry muffin terpene profile, a powerful euphoric effect, beautiful crystal structure and a calm and focused high.  I don't feel the munchies or apprehension or anxiety or fear at all - super smooth inner calm reminds me of Gorilla Glue #4. Better than Blue Dream by a mile.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Blue Nightmare, Middlefork x Pineapple Express, U2 Kush, Snoop Dogg OG, and Ripped Bubba
articles.author: Kayla Williams
articles.text:
Balance is the name of the game this week with a harmonious but diverse assortment flowers: Ripped Bubba, Snoop Dogg OG, Middlefork x Pineapple Express, U2 Kush, and Blue Nightmare. Whether you lean towards indica, sativa, or a hybrid of the two; fruity notes of lemon or skunky, earthy aromas; or euphoric relaxation compared to creative focus, there's a strain for everyone. If you've experienced any of these five new additions, be sure to share the love and leave a review! 
1. Ripped Bubba
Characteristics of Ripped Bubba:

60% indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Pre-98 Bubba Kush and Jack the Ripper
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Sweet cherry, blackberry, lemon, and earthy spice flavors
Promotes functional creativity and focus
Indoor flowering time of 55 to 60 days

2. Snoop Dogg OG
Characteristics of Snoop Dogg OG:

70% indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Lemon OG and Sour Diesel
Diesel aroma with notes of lemon
Delivers creativity, balanced focus, and appetite stimulation

3. Middlefork x Pineapple Express
Characteristics of Middlefork x Pineapple Express:

75% sativa
Cross between Middlefork and Pineapple Express
Fruity, berry, and earthy aroma
Happy, euphoric, and calming effects
High THC content, often greater than 20%

 
 4. U2 Kush
Characteristics of U2 Kush:

80% indica
Cross between Master Kush and Bubba Kush
Sweet, earthy aroma with skunky undertones
Powerful euphoric and sedating effects
Popular for treating insomnia
8 to 9 week flowering time

5. Blue Nightmare
Characteristics of Blue Nightmare:

Balanced hybrid strain
Cross between Blue Dream and Tahoe OG
Bred by RNM Flowers
Distinct blueberry aroma
Delivers intense euphoria, creative, and relaxing effects
